Mitigation Plan: Maintain frequent data backups and perform incremental syncs during migration.
Description: Risk of losing data packets during transfer from on-premise to cloud.

Mitigation Plan: Implement IAM roles, encryption at rest/in transit, and monitor access logs.
Description: Unauthorized users might gain access during transition phase.

Mitigation Plan: Schedule migration during off-peak hours and use CDN caching.
Description: High latency can cause delays in data sync and API failures.

Mitigation Plan: Implement phased migration, setup failover system, and notify users.
Description: Critical apps may be unavailable during cutover.

Mitigation Plan: Validate compliance policies, conduct pre-migration audits, and retain logs.
Description: Possible data storage in non-compliant regions.

Summary: Cost overrun due to extended cloud usage
Mitigation Plan: Track usage via billing dashboards and optimize cloud resources.
Description: Cloud cost may exceed budget if timelines extend.

Mitigation Plan: Automate verification scripts and manual sampling post-migration.
Description: Some data might not be validated after migration.
